languages.text: "Любой мятеж — это удар по Империуму, выгодный врагам Человечества. Раскайся, ибо нет участи страшнее, чем лишиться света Его".

traits.locale_text: "Любой мятеж — это удар по Империуму, выгодный врагам Человечества, и предательство Императора. Раскайся, Адальберт, ибо нет участи страшнее, чем лишиться света Его".

languages.text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
languages.original_text: "Любой мятеж — это удар по Империуму, выгодный врагам Человечества. Раскайся, ибо нет участи страшнее, чем лишиться света Его".

traits.locale_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
"Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
"Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
"Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
"Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
"Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."

languages.text: «Cualquier rebelión es un golpe directo contra el Imperium, un punto a favor de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Arrepiéntase, pues no hay destino peor que privarse de Su luz».
languages.original_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."

traits.locale_text: «Cualquier rebelión es un golpe directo contra el Imperium, un punto a favor de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Arrepiéntase, pues no hay destino peor que privarse de Su luz».

languages.text: 「いかなる反乱も、帝国に対する攻撃であり、人類の敵に有利となる。悔い改めるんだ。主の光を奪われることほど悪い運命はない」
languages.original_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."

traits.locale_text: 「いかなる反乱も、帝国に対する攻撃であり、人類の敵に有利となる。悔い改めるんだ。主の光を奪われることほど悪い運命はない」

languages.text: “无论是什么样的叛乱，都是在削弱帝国的力量，为人类之敌铺平道路。忏悔吧，不要背弃祂的明光，因为没有比这更可怕的命运。”
languages.original_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."

traits.locale_text: “无论是什么样的叛乱，都是在削弱帝国的力量，为人类之敌铺平道路。忏悔吧，不要背弃祂的明光，因为没有比这更可怕的命运。”

languages.text: "Jede Rebellion ist ein Schlag gegen das Imperium zum Vorteil der Feinde der Menschheit. Bereut, denn kein Los ist schlimmer, als Seines Lichtes beraubt zu sein."
languages.original_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."

traits.locale_text: "Jede Rebellion ist ein Schlag gegen das Imperium zum Vorteil der Feinde der Menschheit. Bereut, denn kein Los ist schlimmer, als Seines Lichtes beraubt zu sein."

languages.text: « Toute rébellion est une attaque directe contre l'Imperium et profite aux ennemis de l'humanité. Repentez-vous, car il n'y a pire destin que d'être privé de Sa lumière. »
languages.original_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."

traits.locale_text: « Toute rébellion est une attaque directe contre l'Imperium et profite aux ennemis de l'humanité. Repentez-vous, car il n'y a pire destin que d'être privé de Sa lumière. »

languages.text: "Her türlü isyankârlık İmparatorluk'a karşı bir saldırıdır ve İnsanlığın düşmanlarının avantajınadır. Tövbe et. O'nun ışığından ayrılmış olmaktan daha beter bir kader yoktur."
languages.original_text: "Any rebellion is a strike against the Imperium, to the advantage of the enemies of Humanity. Repent, for there is no fate worse than to be deprived of His light."
